column1: Good caddies have good temperaments. just watch Ian Wright getting a lambasting from Seve Ballesteros and see if Ian ever answers back, or, indeed, reacts in any way other than to quietly stand and take it on the chin, metaphorically speaking of course.

column1: ‘ That's the whole point — regardless, Miss Everett, that both you and I know that you 're never going to marry him anyway, Travis, who cares deeply for his family,’ as you do, Leith could well have inserted, ‘ is only going to take it on the chin and let you go, by learning that the person you do love is a member of his family, who loves you in return.’
